chilliwebs.ezjdo.com.exceptions

Class ezJDOException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • chilliwebs.ezjdo.com.exceptions.ezJDOException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ezJDOValidationException

    public class ezJDOException
extends java.lang.Exception
    Standard exception for the ezJDO library, this exception takes a string message.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ezJDOException(java.lang.String message)
      Standard exception for the ezJDO library, this exception takes a string message.
      ezJDOException(java.lang.String message, java.lang.Throwable cause)
      Standard exception for the ezJDO library, this exception can be used to expose the underlying exception if the developer feels it necessary.
